value:
$WmMPID_比翼マルス,ch01_00_Marth_MF_Pair,Face|Time to tie this winter festival off with
a neat little bow, wouldn't you say?$k$p$nMPID_比翼エリス|Yes! Let's finish it with a bang—or a
vigorous jingle, at least!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_WinterFes19,Face|I believe in us! Let's see it through
all the way to the end!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_WinterFes19,Face|The sooner the better.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭若ゼフィール,ch03_25_Zefhyr_M_WinterFes19,Face|Though I am loath to part ways with
present company, I would like to
know how my sister is faring.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ソティス,ch17_05_Sothis_F_WinterFes19,Face|Come! The night's entertainment is
not nearly done!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|We've done it! Victory is ours!$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|Defeated... Forgive me, dear sister.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|No, Laevatein. It is I who should beg
forgiveness. I had hoped to give you
a glorious present...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Well, why don't you take these?$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|You're...truly offering?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Of course! If I'm passing out gifts, it
would be rude not to include you.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|That is very kind, Princess Sharena.
We shall humbly accept.$k$pLaevatein, I hope you will be pleased
with this as a winter festival gift.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Very much, Laegjarn. Thank you.$k$pWill you accept this from me, in kind?$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Very gratefully.$k$pTo receive such a gesture from you...
My heart melts as softly as snow...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Look how happy you've made them,
Sharena. That was quite a good deed.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I've realized something important
today, Alfonse.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Giving out presents is even better
than receiving them!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Well said indeed.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|That's why, when I ask for presents
from the winter festival envoy, I'll ask
for gifts to give everyone else!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Very good. Wait, what?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I've been well-behaved this year,
haven't I? I've earned lots of gifts!$k$p$EFace_Smile|Hear that, winter festival envoy?
Mark that on your list!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Sharena, the winter festival envoy is...
No, you know what? Never mind.$k$p$Sbs150|
